message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a price of $9500 for the product. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, taking into account its worth to you at $10000. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways for your company. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
